tool_description: Axesso API to query data from Facebook like posts, comments and corresponding replies.  Please contact us if you require a custom plan tailored to your requirements.
name: Axesso - FB Data Service
title: Axesso - Facebook Data Service

api_list.name: hastag search
api_list.description: Search public posts including passed hashtag

api_list.name: page info
api_list.description: Fetch information for a page like followers and many more

api_list.name: post details
api_list.description: Fetch post details for a single post

api_list.name: comments
api_list.description: Fetch comments for a given feedbackId (returned in the post endpoint). For pagination the optional query parameter "after" can be used by including "comments.data.feedback.page_info.end_cursor" from the previous response.

api_list.name: replies
api_list.description: Fetch comments for for given feedbackId which is located in "data.feedback.display_comments.edges.node.feedback.id" in the post or comments endpoint. For pagination the optional query parameter "after" can be used by including "comments.data.feedback.page_info.end_cursor" from the revious response.

api_list.name: posts
api_list.description: Query posts by providing url e.g. https://www.facebook.com/longhornsteakhouse/posts/.  In the response the field "nextUrl" have to passed to the next request to fetch the next posts.
